body.p: The auto_explain module provides a means for logging execution plans of slow statements automatically, without having to run EXPLAIN by hand.

The Greenplum Database pageinspect module is based on the PostgreSQL pageinspect module. The Greenplum version of the module differs only in that it does not allow inspection of pages belonging to append-optimized or external relations.
See auto_explain in the PostgreSQL documentation for detailed information about the parameters that configure this module's behavior.
